home.savingsPromise: Save up to 30% on your grocery bills
home.subtitle: Compare prices across all stores in Sapporo and save on every purchase
home.leaderboardSubtitle: See what's hot and where to save right now

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to start saving on everyday items

step1.title: Create Your Cart
step1.description: Add the products you need to your shopping cart

step2.title: Compare Prices
step2.description: Instantly see which nearby store offers the maximum savings

step3.title: Save Money
step3.description: Shop smart and maximize your savings on every purchase. Please don't forget to submit your shopping receipts.

developerNote.title: A Note From the Developer
developerNote.content:
Pocket Ninja is your shopping companion that helps you save on every purchase by showing you the nearest store offering the maximum savings. Pocket Ninja works best when we all contribute. Every receipt you upload helps everyone in Sapporo save money. Together, we can build a community where smart shopping is easy and accessible for all.
Small steps, Big savings

auth.subtitle: Sign in to start saving today
auth.terms: By continuing, you allow us to access your email address so we can request your feedback and improve your experience. Your details will never be shared with anyone.
auth.failureTitle: We couldnâ€™t sign you in. Please try again or choose a different login method.

feedback.title: Submit Feedback
feedback.subtitle: Your feedback directly helps us to improve Pocket Ninja.
feedback.placeholder: Tell us what you like or what we can improve...
feedback.success: Thanks! Your feedback was submitted successfully.
feedback.validationError: Please provide a rating or a short feedback so we can work on it.

upload.leaderboardSubtitle: Top contributors maximizing savings for everyone!
upload.contributeSubtitle: Share a clear photo of your recent shopping receipt, we will handle the math and unlock savings for the community. Small steps, Big savings
upload.thankYouNote: Every receipt helps in finding a better deal. We appreciate your effort!
upload.noReceipts: No receipts found for this month.

compare.title: Build Your Cart
compare.subtitle: Add your items and instantly compare prices across all stores in Sapporo
compare.cartEmpty: Your cart is empty. Add items to compare prices and see potential savings!
compare.reminderBody:
After your purchase, please don't forget to submit your receipt!
Your contribution is highly appreciated.
compare.locationError: Could not get your location. Using central Sapporo instead.

almostThere.title: Almost There
almostThere.content: This section is ready, but we don't have sufficient data to go live yet. Please contribute by submitting your shopping receipts with us to help us launch faster.
